answerText: flask[10] The "separatory" variety of this other piece of lab equipment is used to perform liquid-liquid extraction. Vacuum filtration uses one of these objects named for Büchner.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 6 | 1 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: One type of this piece of lab equipment named for Dewar contains two chambers separated by a vacuum and is designed to minimize heat transfer. [10] Name this piece of lab equipment. Another type named for Erlenmeyer contains a flat bottom and tapered neck and is used to hold chemicals.
